original_text: Then the servant began to look in the bags. He began with the oldest brother's bag and he finished with the youngest brother's bag. Then he found the cup in Benjamin's bag!
korean_text: 그가 나이 많은 자에게서부터 시작하여 나이 적은 자에게까지 조사하매 그 잔이 베냐민의 자루에서 발견된지라

sentences.original_text: Then the servant began to look in the bags.
He began with the oldest brother's bag
and he finished with the youngest brother's bag.
Then he found the cup in Benjamin's bag!
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그가 베냐민의 가방에서 잔을 발견했습니다!
